trans-unit.source: The XpsImage class has no public constructor.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>메서드 이미지를 추가 하 고 새 문서에 대 한 참조를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A> method to obtain an image reference in an existing document.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>기존 문서에서 이미지 참조를 얻는 메서드를.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the XpsImage class may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 따라 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>와 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, 플러시 작업의는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>XpsImage 클래스의 메서드는 완료 될 때까지 지연 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>닫힙니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>
